definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The study of modern lexicology has made great breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 现代词汇学已经获得了较大的突破。

sentences.english: This paper comments on the effect of corpus empirical studies on lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 论述了语料库实证研究对词汇学的影响和作用。

sentences.english: Chapter four abstracts the lexical and semantic features of web-English.
sentences.chinese: 第四章概括出网络英语在词汇学方面的特征。

sentences.english: Personality structure of intellectuals are explored based on the hypothesis of lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 采用词汇学假设，探讨了知识分子的人格结构。

sentences.english: This paper comments on the of effect of corpus empirical studies on lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 论述了语料库实证研究对词汇学的影响和作用。

sentences.english: Etymon is an important concept in the historical Lexicology.
sentences.chinese: “理据”是历史词汇学的一个重要概念。

sentences.english: English lexicology itself is a sub-branch of linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 英语词汇学是语言学的一个分支。

sentences.english: Lexicology is a subject which studies words and phrases.
sentences.chinese: 词汇学是研究语言词汇的一门学科。

sentences.english: Lexicology is a branch of linguistics, inquiring into the origins and meanings of words.
sentences.chinese: 词汇学是语言学的一个分支，研究词汇的起源和意义。

sentences.english: The study of neologisms is one of the important aspects in lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 新词是词汇学研究的重要方面。

definition: study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
